title: Cut
description: A savage killing. A girl missing. A clock ticking. A cop who sees the world differently. Detective Jack Grogan investigates the disappearance of the Chinese Trade Ministerâ€™s 15 year old daughter, following the brutal murder of her bodyguard. He soon discovers that Lynsey Tao is a pawn in a game where no one can be trusted and nothing is what it seems.
author: Frank McGrath
